name: Neon Rider Drives Sports Car
description:
Welcome to the Cyberspace! Explore neon racing tracks and become a legend! Develop car control skills to have totally new racing experience!

NEON CARS

Are you the fan of neon cars? Great! Here is a wide choice of fast cars. Look at these shining beasts! Maxima, Bee G, Pulse & GOLDENi are powerful sports cars that can easily beat your racing rivals!

CUSTOMIZE CARS

Customize neon cars and try out loads of different modifications. Have your own virtual car factory. It’s so fun to ride with custom car! Try car tuning feature and enjoy speed racing.

REAL RACING EXPERIENCE

Forget previous car racing experience! Take a deep breath and start racing! Avoid obstacles that can damage your car. Control futuristic cars with confidence!

Drive in the green wheel - you will reach crazy speed! Level up your sports car driving skills. Watch other riders chasing cars behind your back. Push the gas pedal to the max, experience the crazy speed and leave no hope for your racing rivals.

Race in 2 worlds: Futuristic city and Cyber track. Collect coins and come back to claim new sports cars. Enjoy smooth gameplay, crazy speed, light music and amazing graphics.

CONTROLS

Become the speed racer as you always wanted to be! Keep your cars safe and focus on your final goal.

◆ Ready, set, GO with the orange button. Make sports cars roaring.
◆ Use ARROW buttons to make stunts, front and back car flips.
◆ Come back everyday to COLLECT COINS. Use them to gain your gifts.

EDUCATIONAL VALUE

Car racing games are good for learning to STIMULATE your reaction, DEVELOP hand-eye coordination, self-preservation and self-control. Forget your racing rivals, race to IMPROVE problem solving, quick decision making and flexible thinking skills.

MINI GAMES

Need a short break from car racing? Get some rest and play these funny mini games: Balloon Pop, Puzzles, Memory Game, Coloring book and Match Shapes.
